commit.message:
re PR c++/19253 (bad error message / ICE for invalid template parameter)

	PR c++/19253
	* parser.c (cp_parser_diagnose_invalid_type_name): Commit to
	tentative parses.

	PR c++/19253
	* g++.dg/template/crash33.C: New test.

From-SVN: r94403

files.patch:

+	tentative parses.

@@ -1,5 +1,8 @@
 2005-01-28  Mark Mitchell  <mark@codesourcery.com>
